alert.note: Alert for Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 28 at 3:18PM EDT until October 29 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Fairfield, Northern New Haven, Northern Middlesex and Northern New London Counties. In New Jersey, Western Passaic, Eastern Passaic and Western Bergen Counties. In New York, Rockland and Northern Westchester Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Passaic
